name: Asteroids (itch) (Logan White)
description:
Hello! This is a class project that I did and I liked so I thought I would share it.

Controls are :

Up Arrow Key: Goes Forward

Left Arrow Key: Turns Left

Right Arrow Key: Turns Right

Spacebar: shoots

keep in mind that for this game I didn't use any of unitys collisions systems or built in interactions I wrote all of the scripts myself. 

Thanks so much. have a blast!
